item.title: Kafka Quickstart
item.description: Apache Kafka is a framework implementation of a software bus using stream processing.

item.title: Stream Processing
item.description: This is a skill assessment lab to help strengthen your understanding of applications that produce and consume events through Kafka streams, all running on Kubernetes.
